sentence.Network_en: Positive aileron deflection produces an anti - clockwise moment about the X axis.
sentence.Network_cn: 正的副翼偏转角产生绕X轴的负方向力矩.

sentence.Network_en: Choose a suitable position and install the control horns of aileron.
sentence.Network_cn: 选择好位置,开始安装副翼上的舵角.

sentence.Network_en: Many airplanes have trim for bank control, called aileron trim.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多飞机有修剪为银行控制, 叫的飞机辅翼修剪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from French, literally small wing', diminutive of aile, from Latin ala 'wing'

entry.def: An aileron is a section on the back edge of the wing of an aircraft that can be raised or lowered in order to control the aircraft's movement.

means.word_mean: 1. an airfoil that controls lateral motion
